headline: Zaka head indicted
description: Tel Aviv Magistrates Court extended the remand of Aharon Grutner, the head of the Bnai Brak branch of Zaka and a security guard at a yeshiva. Grutner is suspected of obstructing justice with regard to police investigations into corruption of yeshiva students. Zaka is a humanitarian organization that ensures terror victims are given proper burials. (Avi Cohen)
articleBody: Tel Aviv Magistrates Court extended the remand of Aharon Grutner, the head of the Bnai Brak branch of Zaka and a security guard at a yeshiva. Grutner is suspected of obstructing justice with regard to police investigations into corruption of yeshiva students. Zaka is a humanitarian organization that ensures terror victims are given proper burials. (Avi Cohen)
title: קטן, אבל מאורגן:  12 טיפים לסידור חכם של המטבח
